title: John Frieda Brilliant Brunette Liquid Shine Luminous Color Glaze-6.5 oz (192 ml)
description: John Frieda brilliant brunette liquid shine luminous color glaze comes in 6.5 ounce bottle reawakens lackluster brunette hair with a hint of rich brown color, satiny texture and multi-dimensional shine. It contains an innovative blend of mild cosmetic dyes and shine boosters to extend the life, luminosity and tonal richness of brunette, while subtly blending away grays.

title: It's A 10 Miracle Hair Mask , 8-Ounces Jars

title: It's a 10 miracle leave -in Plus Keratin 10oz
description: Plus keratin. Does 10 things instantly. Maintenance of keratin straightening treatments. Increases styling and manageability.
